channel.title: Best of Bollywood
channel.description:
I've seen some pretty stellar things come from that corner of the film-industry... men doing incredible stunts on horseback, robots forming serpentine super-structures, even a mis-heard mammarian-sounding song.
But the best thing to come from Bollywood, in my opinion, is the musical number [b]Ilu Ilu[/b]:[indent][url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qWUP-EOe7H8[/url][/indent]
It has all the innocent charm of the Trololo song, plus it reinforces every stereotype I've ever had of Indian culture (which makes me feel less bad for having them).

item.title: Best of Bollywood
item.dc:creator: Dr_Karamazov
item.description:
I raise you, BOLLYWOOD TERMINATOR KATAMARI DAMACY WITH RUSSIAN DUBBING

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7yBnl_krN_U

Can you handle such oddness?

item.title: Best of Bollywood
item.dc:creator: Flatline
item.description:
Jethrosoup:

Wow! A modern retelling of Romeo and Juliet! Glad to see Hollywood isn’t the only faction of the movie industry that is running out of ideas.

Shakespeare’s Romeo and Juliet was a remake…
